title: Architect Magazine by Pentagram
content:
Hi, can anyone identify the typeface used on the cover of 'Architect' Magazine. Design by Pentagram.  
Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100909054842im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Architect_JB_6185.jpg)
author: apparatus™

comments.content: This clearly is Lucas de Groot’s wonderful [taz](http://web.archive.org/web/20100909054842/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/fonts/taz/) — and they haven’t even come to close to tapping out the potential of the fifteen weights it has.
